title: 87/578/EEC: Commission Decision of 27 November 1987 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Italy (Basilicata) pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 27 November 1987
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Italy (Basilicata) pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(87/578/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions relating to the implementation of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85, which are the subject of Decision No 1021 of the Basilicata Region of 17 March 1987 and which were forwarded by the Italian Government on 4 June 1987, are hereby deemed to satisfy the conditions for a financial contribution by the Community towards the common measure referred to in Article 1 of the said Regulation.
The Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 November 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 194, 17. 7. 1986, p. 4.
